ConvO


Offering

ConvO is the ultimate launchpad to bring fundraising and early subscription of
exclusive investment opportunities in the form of private-sale tokens


Quality investment opportunities selected with due diligence

Verifiable Random Function for fair allocation

Decentralized distribution controlled by smart contracts


Launch ConvO


ConvX

Swap

ConvX is an AMM-based decentralized exchange to provide a liquid market for
anyone to swap the private-sale tokens


Price discovery

Instant exchange rate

Best order routing


Swap Now


ConvPool

Liquidity

ConvPool is the liquidity pool behind ConvX and anyone can provide liquidity
to earn instant rewards from the transaction fees


Provide Liquidity


ConvPool


Stake

ConvPool supports yield farming and liquidity providers can maximize CONV
rewards by staking LP tokens. CONV holders can stake CONV to earn more CONV
and gain premium access during token subscription.

Stake Now
